definitions: a person or group that compels observance of or compliance with a law, rule, or obligation

examples.text: the city police's role as enforcers of traffic rules will increase
we will encourage law enforcers to take strict measures against those involved in corruption

shortDefinitions: person or group that compels observance of or compliance with law, rule, or obligation

definitions: a person who imposes their will by violence and intimidation

examples.text: gangland enforcers linked to a drugs gang

shortDefinitions: person who enforces their will by violence and intimidation

definitions: (in sports) a strong, aggressive, or intimidating player whose role is to protect teammates or dominate an area of the field of play

examples.text: a surprising twist in career for the burly defensive enforcer
